title: Automated File Processor
description: A scheduled task that reads a local text file, counts the number of words, and logs the result every five minutes.

title: Weather Data FTP Listener
description: An FTP listener that connects to the National Weather Service FTP server, retrieves new weather data files, and logs them.

title: Stock Price Data Manager
description: Retrieves a daily summary of stock price data from a public API and uploads it to an FTP server in CSV format.

title: Weather-Based Activity Recommender
description: Combines weather data and AI-powered recommendations to suggest personalized activities based on current weather conditions and user interests.

title: Shipment Processing Use Case
description: A comprehensive integration that processes shipment CSV files from SFTP, enriches data, stores in database, generates reports, and sends email notifications.

title: Real-Time Error Notifier
description: Continuously monitors application logs in real time, detects critical errors, and instantly sends alerts to a designated Slack channel.

title: Scheduled Logger
description: A scheduled task that logs the current timestamp every five seconds. Useful for tracking time-based executions.

title: Pizza Order Management Agent
description: An AI-powered agent for managing pizza orders, developed with Ballerina Copilot, that assists with order management workflows.

title: Weather-Based Music Recommender
description: A REST API that suggests Spotify playlists based on the current weather at your location by fetching real-time weather data.

title: Math Tutor
description: An AI-powered math tutor that uses Azure OpenAI's GPT models to assist with specific mathematical operations like sum, multiply, and square root.

title: AI Chat Agent for HR Information
description: An AI-powered chat agent that provides assistance with HR-related inquiries by referencing company-specific HR policies using RAG with Pinecone vector database.

title: JSON to XML Converter
description: A REST API that converts incoming JSON payloads into XML format and returns the transformed response.

title: Currency Converter API
description: A REST API that converts currency from one unit to another using an external exchange rate API with Redis caching for improved performance.

title: Daily Email Notifier
description: A scheduled task that sends a daily email update at 8 AM using the Gmail API, demonstrating integration with external email services.

title: Hello World Service
description: A basic REST API that responds with a personalized greeting when accessed, sending back a hello message based on the query parameter provided.
